## App structure 

The application's functions are in the abstract syntax tree below:

```{r}
#| eval: true
#| include: true
#| echo: false
#| comment: ""
ast(
  launch_app(
    app_ui(
      mod_var_input_ui(),
      mod_viz_ui(),
      mod_table_ui(),
      mod_report_ui()
    ),
    app_server(
      mod_var_input_server(),
      mod_viz_server(),
      mod_table_server(),
      mod_report_server()
    )
  )
)
```
